channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins eXtreme Feedback Panel Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins eXtreme Feedback Panel Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34790|2024-08-03T09:22:10.311Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20extreme%20feedback%20panel%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins eXtreme Feedback Panel Plugin 2.0.1 and earlier does not escape the job names used in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
